title: Why an aviation trade war would be ‘lose-lose’ for everyone
text:
Airbus, along with our partners in the industry, sees the position taken by United States Trade Representative (USTR) in the application of tariffs to commercial aircraft as well as application to EU goods unrelated to the US/EU aircraft disputes as truly unfortunate.

Indeed, the entire, 15-year-long dispute concerning government support to aircraft manufacturers has done nothing – nor will it do anything – to make the aerospace industries in the US or the EU stronger or more competitive.

Airbus introduced true global competition in the large commercial aircraft industry, to the benefit of airlines and in partnership with aerospace suppliers all over the world. Within that market environment,...
description: Airbus, along with our partners in the industry, sees the position taken by United States Trade Representative (USTR) in the application of tariffs to commercial aircraft as well as application to EU goods unrelated to the US/EU aircraft disputes as truly unfortunate.
